SEARCH
Package com.gaminghub.app.presentation.model

Class OrderModel

java.lang.Object
com.gaminghub.app.presentation.model.OrderModel
public class OrderModel extends Object
Represents a domain model for an order in the system.

This class maps to the `orders` table and contains details such as order ID, total amount, customer ID, and creation timestamp. It is used within the presentation layer of the application and can be converted to a corresponding OrderEntity for persistence.

Author:
COvermyer
